roleset.name: like a bird
roleset.note: PERCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'perch' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 47.6, 9.2, 50; Framenet entry Placing. (from perch.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: But the greatest damage was visited on [buildings and roadways]-1 perched [*]-1 upon landfill, as were the Marina District of San Francisco and the Bay Bridge -- two areas of maximum devastation.
example.arg: as were the Marina District of San Francisco and the Bay Bridge -- two areas of maximum devastation

example.name: args 0 and 2 merged
example.text: John's parakeet perched on the end of his nose.
example.arg: on the end of his nose
